13741611.VoiceDir29.6D03F: Keeping his feelings toward Donan guarded.

294970C2.Line27.6D03F: The mark of the Horadrim. An ancient order of scholars and mages, sworn to protect Sanctuary from demons. These days, we are few in number.

31D87E6C.VoiceDir33.6D03F: Matter-of-factly. Keeping his feelings toward Donan guarded.

477C7557.Line41.BAE4: Sounds like he could help us.

65381056.Line13.BAE4: He also gave me this amulet. What is it?

67D8A102.Line45.6D03F: Your ties to Lilith, the visions you see—you are the key to finding her and stopping whatever she has planned.

7B96CC21.Line35.6D03F: I am going to the Dry Steppes to find out who that Pale Man is. Join me when you can, just... be careful.

AF7FBF25.Line39.6D03F: Hm. You should seek him out in Scosglen.

CBCCF7EE.VoiceDir35.6D03F: Guarded when he talks about Pale Man

CDE42780.Line43.6D03F: But don’t forget about the Cathedral. They’ll be expecting you, and they might prove to be useful allies too.

E1A2529F.Line33.6D03F: His breadth of knowledge about demons is equal only to his hubris.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “I had to pay for your weapon.”

FFB5EAF2.VoiceDir39.6D03F: Hesistant, hiding his feelings about Donan
